VEC.Q: How many ridgelines are in this ridgeline chart?
VEC.A: There are {7} slices in this chart.

SRP.Q: What is the spatial relationship of the peak of Return Policies relative to the peak of Product Range in terms of vertical (above/below) and horizontal (left/right) directions?
SRP.A: The peak of  Return Policies is to the {left} of the peak of Product Range.

VPR.Q: What distribution pattern does the ridgeline representing Customer Support show?
VPR.A: The ridgeline representing Customer Support shows a {Periodic fluctuation}.

VPR.Q: At what value do  Delivery Speed reach its peaks?

EVJ.Q: Which ridgeline has the highest peak
EVJ.A: The ridgeline representing {Loyalty Programs} has the highest peak.

EVJ.Q: Which label has the highest density at X =89.6?
EVJ.A: At X =89.6,the label with the highest density is {Return Policies}

NF.Q: Which countries in the ridgeline chart have ridgeline peaks exceed 48? Please list the countries and corresponding peak values.
NF.A: {Return Policies}'s peak at {81},{Customer Support}'s peak at {84},{Product Range}'s peak at {84}

NF.Q: Which countries in the ridgeline chart have ridgeline peaks below 45? Please list the countries and corresponding peak values.
NF.A: {Product Quality}'s peak at {18},{Personalization}'s peak at {24},{Delivery Speed}'s peak at {9},{Loyalty Programs}'s peak at {11}

NC.Q: Which one has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline: Personalization or Delivery Speed?
NC.A: {Personalization} has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline.

NC.Q: Which one has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline: Return Policies or Personalization?
NC.A: {Return Policies} has a larger X value at the peak of its ridgeline.

MSR.Q: How many ridges have their peak located to the right of the average X value across all ridges?
MSR.A: There are {3} ridges whose peaks are located to the right of the average X value.

MSR.Q: What is the label of the ridge with the largest span along the mountain height?
MSR.A: The ridge with the largest span in the mountain height is {Loyalty Programs}
